content.query:
SELECT 'ChannelType' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]
 FROM [adworkstarget].[dbo].[ChannelType]
UNION ALL
 SELECT 'Country' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]
 FROM [adworkstarget].[dbo].[Country]
UNION ALL
 SELECT 'Customer' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]
 FROM [adworkstarget].[dbo].[Customer]
UNION ALL
 SELECT 'IndividualCustomer' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]
 FROM [adworkstarget].[dbo].[IndividualCustomer]
UNION ALL
 SELECT 'Location' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]
 FROM [adworkstarget].[dbo].[Location]
UNION ALL
 SELECT 'Territory' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]
 FROM [adworkstarget].[dbo].[Territory]
UNION ALL
 SELECT 'Transaction' as [TableName], count(*) as [RowCount]
 FROM [adworkstarget].[dbo].[Transaction]
